name: pjfi

-| wb(wf(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, chba), wa(wfn(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba), wss(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), chba)))

⊣ ran((projh ` c0))⊆ ~H
⊣ (((projh ` c0): ~H → ~H)↔((projh ` c0)[Fn]~H ∧ ran((projh ` c0))⊆ ~H))
